xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_LILLY_ESCORT_DESC: • Find a way to make Spider Lilly escort the Hostages to their final destination.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_SATELLITE_DISH_DES: • Interrupt Spider Lilly while she is in her office.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_FOG_HORN_DESC: • Interrupt The Blade while he is in his office.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CRANE_47_DESC: Stop the Crane on area 4, and then stop it on area 7
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_SHOOT_LAMPS_DESC: shoot all the lamps on the ship
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HOSTAGES_MOVED_DES: • Complete the Mission without the Hostages being moved.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_DESC: • Eliminate Captain Re Thack with the boom gate.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_NAME: Don't Let The Boom Gate Hit You...
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CAR_KILL_DESC: • Eliminate a target with the car lift.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CANNON_KILL_DESC: • Eliminate and hide a target with a cannon.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_RAFT_KILL_DESC: • Eliminate two main targets with the same life raft.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Eliminate the three main targets while they are escaping.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Eliminate three targets with the same explosion.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_GOT_A_LIGHT_NAME: Burning On The Dock Of The Bay
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Eliminate the three main targets with the cargo crane.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Eliminate all bodyguards after starting the evacuation.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Eliminate and hide five targets in water.

en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_LILLY_ESCORT_DESC: • Find a way to make Captain Re Thak escort the hostages to their final destination.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_SATELLITE_DISH_DES: • Interrupt Captain Re Thak while she is in her office.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_FOG_HORN_DESC: • Interrupt Colonel Jin Noo while he is in his office.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HOSTAGES_MOVED_DES: • Complete the mission without the hostages being moved.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_DESC: • Eliminate Captain Re Thak with the boom gate.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_NAME: Don't Let the Boom Gate Hit You...
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CAR_KILL_DESC: • Eliminate a target with the car lift.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CANNON_KILL_DESC: • Eliminate and hide a target with a cannon.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_RAFT_KILL_DESC: • Eliminate two main targets with the same life raft.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Eliminate the three main targets while they are escaping.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Eliminate three targets with the same explosion.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_GOT_A_LIGHT_NAME: Burning on the Dock of the Bay
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Eliminate the three main targets with the cargo crane.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Eliminate all bodyguards after starting the evacuation.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Eliminate and hide five targets in water.

fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_LILLY_ESCORT_DESC: • Trouvez un moyen pour que le capitaine Re Thak escorte les otages jusqu'à leur destination finale.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_SATELLITE_DISH_DES: • Interrompez le capitaine Re Thak pendant qu'elle se trouve dans son bureau.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_FOG_HORN_DESC: • Interrompez le colonel Jin Noo pendant qu'il se trouve dans son bureau.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HOSTAGES_MOVED_DES: • Terminez la mission sans qu'aucun otage ne soit déplacé.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_DESC: • Éliminez le capitaine Re Thak avec la barrière.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CANNON_KILL_DESC: • Éliminez une cible et cachez-la avec un canon.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_RAFT_KILL_DESC: • Éliminez 2 cibles principales avec le même canot de sauvetage.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Éliminez les trois cibles principales pendant qu'elles prennent la fuite.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Éliminez les trois cibles principales avec la grue du cargo.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Éliminez tous les gardes du corps une fois l'évacuation commencée.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_NAME: Les femmes et les enfants d'abord
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BODYHIDER_BODYGUAR: • Éliminez tous les gardes du corps et cachez-les.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BODYHIDER_TARGETS_: • Éliminez toutes les cibles principales et cachez-les.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_ALL_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Éliminez toutes les cibles de tirs à la tête.

it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_LILLY_ESCORT_DESC: • Fai in modo che il capitano Re Thak accompagni gli ostaggi alla loro destinazione finale.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_SATELLITE_DISH_DES: • Interrompi il capitano Re Thak mentre è nel suo ufficio.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_FOG_HORN_DESC: • Interrompi il colonnello mentre è nel suo ufficio.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HOSTAGES_MOVED_DES: • Completa la missione senza che gli ostaggi vengano spostati.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_DESC: • Elimina il capitano Re Thak con la barriera automatica.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_NAME: Non farti colpire dalla barriera automatica...
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CAR_KILL_DESC: • Elimina un bersaglio con il montacarichi per auto.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CANNON_KILL_DESC: • Elimina e nascondi un bersaglio con un cannone.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_RAFT_KILL_DESC: • Elimina due bersagli principali con lo stesso gommone di salvataggio.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_ELECTRIFIED_DESC: • Elimina tre bersagli tramite una scossa elettrica.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Elimina i tre i bersagli principali mentre sono in fuga.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Elimina tre bersagli tramite la stessa esplosione.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Elimina i tre bersagli principali con la gru da carico.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Elimina tutte le guardie del corpo dopo aver dato inizio all'evacuazione.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Elimina e nascondi cinque bersagli in acqua.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BODYHIDER_BODYGUAR: • Elimina e nascondi tutte le guardie del corpo.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BODYHIDER_TARGETS_: • Elimina e nascondi tutti i bersagli principali.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_ALL_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Elimina tutti i bersagli con colpi alla testa.

de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_LILLY_ESCORT_DESC: • Finden Sie einen Weg, damit Hauptmann Re Thak die Geiseln zu ihrem letzten Ziel eskortiert.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_SATELLITE_DISH_DES: • Stören Sie Hauptmann Re Thak, während sie in ihrem Büro ist.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_FOG_HORN_DESC: • Stören Sie Oberst Jin Noo, während er in seinem Büro ist.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_START_CRANE_NAME: Von hier bis in alle Ewigkeit
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HOSTAGES_MOVED_DES: • Schließen Sie die Mission ab, ohne dass die Geiseln verlegt werden.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_RUBBER_DUCK_NAME: Quak, das war ihr letztes Wort
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie Hauptmann Re Thak mit der Schranke.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CAR_KILL_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie ein Ziel mit der Wagen-Hebebühne.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CANNON_KILL_DESC: • Eliminieren und verstecken Sie ein Ziel mit einer Kanone.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_RAFT_KILL_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie zwei Hauptziele mit derselben Rettungsinsel.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie die drei Hauptziele, während sie flüchten.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie drei Hauptziele mit derselben Explosion.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie die drei Hauptziele mit dem Ladekran.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie alle Leibwächter nach Beginn der Evakuierung.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Eliminieren und verstecken Sie fünf Ziele im Wasser.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BODYHIDER_TARGETS_: Der Tod bringt jeden zum Schweigen

es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_LILLY_ESCORT_DESC: • Encuentra el modo de que la capitana Re Thak escolte a los rehenes hasta su destino final.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_SATELLITE_DISH_DES: • Interrumpe a la capitana Re Thak cuando esté en su oficina.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_FOG_HORN_DESC: • Interrumpe al coronel Jin Noo cuando esté en su oficina.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_SHOOT_SEAGULLS_DES: • Dispara a cinco gaviotas en pleno vuelo.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HOSTAGES_MOVED_DES: • Completa la misión sin que trasladen a los rehenes.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_DESC: • Elimina a la capitana Re Thak con la barrera.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BARRIER_KILL_NAME: Que no te dé la barrera...
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CAR_KILL_DESC: • Elimina a un objetivo con el elevador.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CANNON_KILL_DESC: • Elimina y oculta a un objetivo con un cañón.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_CANNON_KILL_NAME: Besa a la hija del artillero
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_RAFT_KILL_DESC: • Elimina a dos objetivos principales con el mismo bote salvavidas.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Elimina a los tres objetivos con la misma explosión.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_GOT_A_LIGHT_NAME: Fuego en el muelle de la bahía
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Elimina a los 3 objetivos principales con la grúa de carga.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Elimina a todos los guardaespaldas tras iniciar la evacuación.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Elimina y oculta a cinco objetivos en el agua.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BODYHIDER_BODYGUAR: • Elimina y oculta a todos los guardaespaldas.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_BODYHIDER_TARGETS_: • Elimina y oculta a todos los objetivos principales.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_SEAGULL_ALL_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Elimina a todos los objetivos con disparos a la cabeza.
